survey_name: Sustainable Coffee Shop Practices Customer Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on sustainable practices in coffee shops to help businesses improve their environmental and social impact.

questions.question_text: How often do you visit coffee shops that promote sustainable practices?
questions.client_notes: Use a clear frequency scale to assess customer engagement with sustainable coffee shops.

script.question_text: How often do you visit coffee shops that promote sustainable practices?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable practices do you value most in a coffee shop? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Use of biodegradable or reusable cups
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify priority areas for customers.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice question with checkboxes and an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable practices do you value most in a coffee shop? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Use of biodegradable or reusable cups

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a small premium (e.g., 5-10%) for coffee served in sustainable packaging?
answer_options: Yes, but only if the price difference is minimal
No, I prefer standard packaging even if it's less sustainable
questions.client_notes: Assesses customer willingness to support sustainability through pricing.
